question_one.title: How can I automate student enrollment and payment management?
question_one.answer: You can use our platform to efficiently manage student enrollments, track payments, and set up automatic reminders to reduce overdue payments, all from a single place, quickly and securely.

question_two.title: What tools does Demy provide for scheduling and room assignments?
question_two.answer: Our platform allows you to automatically assign schedules and classrooms, optimizing the administrative and teaching staff's workload. Users can see real-time updates on schedules and assignments.

question_three.title: How can I track student attendance?
question_three.answer: Demy includes an integrated attendance tracking system that allows you to record and check student attendance easily. This system generates detailed reports to help you monitor student performance.

question_four.title: How does Demy handle user support and training for administrators and teachers?
question_four.answer: Demy provides dedicated support through email and phone, as well as comprehensive training materials for both administrators and teachers. We ensure that your team feels confident using the platform with detailed tutorials and ongoing customer service.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.p: By accessing and using the Demy platform, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions of use. Demy is an academic management platform designed to optimize the administration of academies, educational centers, and teaching organizations.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.p: Demy provides academic management tools including:
section2.li6: Management of teachers and administrative staff

section3.title: 3. User Accounts
section3.p: To access Demy's services, you must create an account by providing accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

section4.title: 4. Acceptable Use
section4.p: You agree to use Demy solely for legitimate academic management purposes. It is prohibited to:
section4.li1: Use the platform for illegal or unauthorized activities
section4.li2: Interfere with the normal operation of the platform
section4.li3: Attempt to access other users' accounts

section5.title: 5. Data and Content
section5.p: You retain all rights to the academic data you enter into Demy. By using our services, you grant us a limited license to process, store, and back up your data solely to provide the service. We are committed to maintaining the confidentiality of sensitive academic information.

section6.title: 6. Billing and Payments
section6.p: Demy's services are available under monthly or annual subscription plans. Payments are processed securely and renew automatically unless you cancel your subscription. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your control panel.

section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.p: Demy is provided "as is". We do not guarantee that the service will be error-free or uninterrupted. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for the service in the 12 months prior to the event that gave rise to the claim.

section8.title: 8. Termination
section8.p: We may suspend or terminate your access to Demy if you violate these terms. Upon termination of the service, your data will remain available for export for 30 days, after which it will be permanently deleted.

section9.title: 9. Modifications
section9.p: We reserve the right to modify these terms. Significant changes will be notified 30 days in advance. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

section10.title: 10. Contact
section10.p: For inquiries about these terms or our services, contact us at: contact_us@demy.com or +51 927 230 192

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.p: At Demy, we collect necessary information to provide our academic management services:
section1.li1: Institution information: Name, address, contact details, tax information
section1.li2: Administrative user data: Names, email addresses, roles, and permissions
section1.li3: Student information: Academic data, contact, payment history (only with authorization)
section1.li5: Usage information: Platform activity, preferences, access logs

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.p: We use the collected information exclusively to:
section2.li1: Provide and improve academic management services
section2.li4: Facilitate communication between the institution and students
section2.li5: Maintain the security and integrity of the platform
section2.li6: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

section3.title: 3. Academic Data Protection
section3.p: Academic data is particularly sensitive. We implement additional security measures:
section3.li2: Restricted access based on roles and permissions
section3.li5: Compliance with educational data protection regulations

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.p: We do not sell or share academic data with third parties, except:
section4.li1: With educational authorities when legally required
section4.li2: With technical service providers under strict confidentiality agreements
section4.li3: With the explicit consent of the educational institution
section4.li4: To comply with court orders or legal requirements

section5.title: 5. Data Retention
section5.p: We retain data according to the following periods:
section5.li1: Academic data: Minimum 5 years (according to educational regulations)

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.p: As an educational institution, you have the right to:
section6.li1: Access and export all your academic data
section6.li4: Restrict the processing of certain data
section6.li5: Request the deletion of data (subject to legal obligations)
section6.li6: Receive notification of any security breach

section7.title: 7. International Transfers
section7.p: Your data may be processed on servers located outside your country. We ensure that any transfer complies with international data protection standards and uses approved standard contractual clauses.

section8.title: 8. Minors
section8.p: When we process data of underage students, we require the consent of parents or legal guardians. Minors' data receives additional protection and is processed solely for legitimate educational purposes.

section9.title: 9. Changes to this Policy
section9.p: We will notify significant changes 30 days in advance. Minor changes will be posted on the platform. Continued use constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

section10.title: 10. Contact and Data Protection Officer
section10.p: For privacy inquiries or to exercise your rights, contact us at: contact_us@demy.com or +51 927 230 192
